Eric M. Huntley, MUP

PhD Student, University of Kentucky Department of Geography
Affiliate, New Mappings Collaboratory

My current research is concerned with urban design, sea level rise, and the politics of anticipatory action. I'm also pursuing a historical project on the landscape architect Ian McHarg's late-career turn towards computerized design methods.

Substantial site coming Summer 2016. For now, find me below.
